name: Tilty Towers
description:
Play as an adventurer exploring poorly made towers. Collect treasure, fight snails and try to keep your towers balanced as you make it to the top of all four levels.

TIP: To keep your tower balanced, push, jump and stand on the side of the tower you want to balance out.

Controls:

Go left and right with the Arrow Keys and WASD

Attack with E

Jump and select with Space

Game made by Noel Albinson and John Sundberg
